sentences.en: a painting full of vibrant reds and blues
sentences.cn: 满是鲜亮的红色和蓝色的画作

sentences.en: He always uses vibrant colours in his paintings.
sentences.cn: 他在画中总是使用鲜明的色彩.

sentences.en: He had a low, vibrant voice.
sentences.cn: 他有个低沉, 洪亮的嗓子.

sentences.en: His vibrant voice commove the air.
sentences.cn: 他响亮的声音振动了空气.

sentences.en: His voice was quiet, yet vibrant with controlled rage.
sentences.cn: 他的声音平静沉着, 但是因为他竭力抑制住满腔怒火,还是不免有点颤抖.

sentences.en: Hong Kong is a vibrant, fascinating city.
sentences.cn: 香港是座富有活力的迷人城市。

sentences.en: Horizon Blue, Corn Yellow and Pistachio Green are just three of the vibrant colours in this range.
sentences.cn: 天际蓝、玉米黄、淡草绿色只是这一色系内的3种亮色。

sentences.en: I guess it depends on the meaning of the word “vibrant.
sentences.cn: 我猜这个词应该作它“振动的、战栗的”词义解读。

sentences.en: Orlando itself is vibrant, full of affordable accommodation and great places to eat.
sentences.cn: 奥兰多本身充满了朝气，有很多便宜的旅馆和吃饭的好去处。

sentences.en: She gave a vibrant performance in the leading role in the school play.
sentences.cn: 她在学校表演中生气盎然地扮演了主角.

sentences.en: She possessed the vibrant personality that is so often popularly associated with Spanish women.
sentences.cn: 她拥有通常会令人联想到西班牙女性的火热个性。

sentences.en: She was sixteen, young and vibrant.
She was vibrant with health and enthusiasm.
Thailand is at its most vibrant during the New Year celebrations.
sentences.cn: 在欢度新年期间，泰国举国欢腾。

sentences.en: That color is too vibrant for this room.
sentences.cn: 对这个房间来说那种色彩太鲜了.

sentences.en: The grass was a vibrant green.
The leaves were vibrant in the breeze.
The little car looked dusty and vulnerable amid the vibrant taxis.
sentences.cn: 在生机勃勃的汽车群里,这小车显得一身尘土,经不起碰撞.

sentences.en: Tom felt himself being drawn towards her vibrant personality.
sentences.cn: 汤姆感觉自己被她充满朝气的个性所吸引。

words.tran_cn: [力] 振动的，震动性的；摇摆的
振动器；[电子] 振子；振动按摩器；振动滚筒；簧片
[力]振动的；充满生气的；响亮的；战栗的

trans.tran_cn: 充满生机的；生气勃勃的；精力充沛的；鲜艳的；醒目的；响亮的；洪亮的；强劲的
trans.tran_en: full of activity or energy in a way that is exciting and attractive
